resources.string: Dropdown for Location of Item at Home
We are Team Zenith, which means the highest point in the sky or the highest achievement in preserving the environment.
We created this application with the aim of providing knowledge to the users so that they can learn some information about the electronic devices found in their homes.

Based on the geographical conditions and natural resources of this country, as well as the challenges faced in preserving and conserving the environment, Indonesia, as the largest archipelago in the world, possesses incredibly rich biodiversity, with vast rainforests, high mountains, and diverse marine ecosystems.

However, Indonesia also faces several significant environmental issues. One of them is massive deforestation. Activities such as illegal logging, forest clearance for agriculture and mining expansion, and uncontrolled forest fires have led to the loss of millions of hectares of forest every year. This not only has a negative impact on biodiversity but also contributes to global greenhouse gas emissions.

Pollution is also a serious concern in Indonesia. Air pollution, particularly in urban areas such as Jakarta, Surabaya, and Bandung, has reached hazardous levels that pose risks to human health. Meanwhile, water pollution occurs in several rivers and lakes in Indonesia due to industrial waste, agricultural runoff, and unregulated chemical use.

Climate change is also a significant issue in Indonesia. The country is vulnerable to threats such as rising sea levels, increased extreme temperatures, floods, and droughts. Small islands in Indonesia are at risk of submergence due to global warming and polar ice melting. Furthermore, climate change can also affect food production, water resources, and public health.
